logic

Class Challenge

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • logic.Challenge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChallengeInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChallengeEasy, ChallengeHard

    public class Challenge
extends java.util.Observable
implements ChallengeInterface
    Challenge. Each challenge the user play is represented by this class. The interaction with the state machine is also made here. Interface should use this class

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Challenge.Categories
      All possible categories and the random mode.

      This variable saves the number of questions the user got right until now.
      protected java.util.List<Question> questionsList
      List of all questions associated with this challenge.

    • Field Detail

      • currentState

        protected IState currentState
        Current state of the state machine.

      • questionsList

        protected java.util.List<Question> questionsList
        List of all questions associated with this challenge. This array list is filled when the challenge is created, with 15 Question objects.

      • currentQuestion

        protected Question currentQuestion
        Current question being asked to the user.

      • currentCorrectAnswer

        protected boolean currentCorrectAnswer
        Current result answer.

      • currentQuestionNumber

        protected int currentQuestionNumber
        Represents current question number. This is only to facilitate the determination of last question without having to compare which question is currentQuestion in the array list. Has to be incremented whenever the user moves to next question.

      • numberOfQuestionsRight

        protected int numberOfQuestionsRight
        This variable saves the number of questions the user got right until now.
